entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx
  • Add Support for explicitly including Dependencies in build output in PackageReference #32863

Closed

  • Unable to link a .EditorConfig via Build Props. Missing documentation? #32837
  • "dotnet tool run <COMMAND_NAME> [<toolArguments>...] [options]" #32861
  • `dotnet publish` updates `project.deps.json` for a project with a `PackageReference` with `PrivateAssets="All"` even when nothing has changed #28661
  • SourceLink: Repository instance not found in cache #32714

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Make GenerateToolsSettingsFileFromBuildProperty incremental #32798
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Back up to latest 17.7 build for p5 #32826
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Read workload sets in workload manifest reader #32766
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2189024 #32811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
